content: forget footballs this game day we re playing with yarn balls join the free marly bird game day mystery make-along 2025 and craft an exclusive knit or crochet project alongside thousands of fellow crafters ✨ step-by-step mystery project perfect for all skill levels fun fast and totally free which team are you on team knit or team crochet let s stitch up something amazing click below to sign up now and get ready for the best game day ever join the make-along here https //marlybird com/blog/game-day-mystery-make-along-2025/
